      SuperClass for 3d Geometry to allow a fragment specification ($fa, $fs and $fn).

      Creates a 2d circle.

      Creates a Cube.

      Creates a cylinder.

      Node for specifying fragments during mesh creation (or curves).

      Creates a polygon from a vector of 2d points.
      class  Polyhedron
      Creates a Polyhedron from a list of vectors for points, and vectors for face indexes.
      class  Sphere
      Creates a sphere from a single radius input.
      class  Square
      Creates a 2d square (rectangle).

      This creates a multi-line block of code by appending the Input blocks.
